SEARCH
Package mk.musiclibraryweb.models

Class Song

java.lang.Object
mk.musiclibraryweb.models.Song
public class Song extends Object
The Song class represents a musical track with information about its ID, title, composer, album, release date, and duration.
Version:
5.0
Author:
Michal Kaminski

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static int
    songCounter
    A static counter used to assign unique IDs to each song.

      public static int songCounter

  • Constructor Details

    • Song

      public Song(String songTitle, String authorName, String authorSurname, String songAlbum, String songRelease, String songTime)
      Constructs a new Song object with the given details.
      Parameters:
      songTitle - The title of the song
      authorName - The author's first name
      authorSurname - The author's surname
      songAlbum - The album name the song belongs to
      songRelease - The release date of the song
      songTime - The duration of the song in seconds

  • Method Details

    • setSongTitle

      public void setSongTitle(String songTitle) throws WrongInputException
      Sets the title of the song.
      Parameters:
      songTitle - The new title of the song
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if the title is null or blank

    • setAuthorName

      public void setAuthorName(String authorName) throws WrongInputException
      Sets the composer's first name.
      Parameters:
      authorName - The new first name of the composer
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if the name is null or blank

    • setAuthorSurname

      public void setAuthorSurname(String authorSurname) throws WrongInputException
      Sets the composer's surname.
      Parameters:
      authorSurname - The new surname of the composer
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if the surname is null or blank

    • setSongAlbum

      public void setSongAlbum(String songAlbum) throws WrongInputException
      Sets the album name of the song.
      Parameters:
      songAlbum - The new album name of the song
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if the album name is null or blank

    • setSongRelease

      public void setSongRelease(String songRelease) throws WrongInputException
      Sets the release date of the song.
      Parameters:
      songRelease - The new release date of the song
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if the date format is invalid or date is null or blank

    • setSongTime

      public void setSongTime(String songTime) throws WrongInputException
      Sets the duration of the song.
      Parameters:
      songTime - The new duration of the song in seconds
      Throws:
      WrongInputException - if the duration is null or blank or not a positive integer

    • update

      public void update(Song song)
      Updates the properties of the current song with the values from the given song.
      Parameters:
      song - the Song object containing the updated values
